hero.title: Research Policy
hero.intro: Comprehensive research policies and guidelines governing research activities, ethical standards, and academic integrity at Shivalik College of Engineering (SCE), Shivalik Institute of Pharmacy and Sciences (SIPS), and College of Pharmacy (COP).

policies.title: Research Policy SCE and SIPS
policies.description: Comprehensive research policy framework for Shivalik College of Engineering and Shivalik Institute of Pharmacy and Sciences, outlining research objectives, procedures, ethical guidelines, and institutional support mechanisms.

policies.title: Research Policy COP
policies.description: Dedicated research policy for the College of Pharmacy, addressing discipline-specific research protocols, pharmaceutical research ethics, clinical trial guidelines, and regulatory compliance requirements.

policies.title: Annexures
policies.description: Supporting documentation, forms, templates, and supplementary materials including research proposal formats, ethical clearance forms, publication guidelines, and funding application templates.

metadata.title: Research Policy | Shivalik College
metadata.description: Research policies and governance framework for Shivalik College of Engineering, Institute of Pharmacy and Sciences, and College of Pharmacy, ensuring ethical research practices and academic excellence.
